about_the_game:
FAIRE HOLLOW is a cozy 2D farming sim and RPG, where you manage a Renaissance Faire.

Huzzah! You are a struggling event planner who's been given one last chance to prove yourself: your job is to take over the renaissance festival and restore it to its former glory!

To manage the ren faire you must establish new attractions and games, manage food vendors and shops, and interact with the eccentric locals. But beware late at night: the festival holds secrets and hidden dangers.




Bring your festival to life as you explore a rich and colorful 2D world that changes with the seasons and offers secrets around every corner. Gather materials to craft items, tame animals, brew mead, and learn magical spells.




Transform your humble festival grounds by cultivating a variety of crops. Harvest fruits, vegetables, and herbs to create unique dishes and brews that will delight your visitors. Use your harvested materials to craft beautiful items and powerful tools: wands, swords, armor, and much more. The more you grow and create, the more your festival will flourish.




When the sun sets, the festival grounds reveal mysteries unexplained. Prepare to battle mythical creatures and fend off mischievous fairies and fearsome monsters. Strengthen your character, unlock new abilities, and gather rare materials from your fallen foes to further enhance your festival.




Your ultimate goal is to build the most spectacular renaissance faire the world has ever seen. Design and upgrade enchanting attractions, curate captivating performances, and ensure every guest experiences the magic of the festival. Your success will draw in bigger crowds, rare merchants, and unique characters with their own storylines and quests.

About the developer

Faire Hollow is built entirely by a full-time solo indie developer. My name is @alMoo. You can follow along and contribute on the Discord: I regularly post progress videos and dev logs, and I'd love your feedback. I am passionate about this game, and it is truly gratifying to be able to share it with you.
